divs: sighting detailsi left my girl friends house aroun 11:00 sunday night 3\28\2011. i was heading south on main rd in tiverton ri, as i came ovever the top of the last hill before i get onto the highway, i could see 3 bright lights stationary over my home town, portsmouth ri. its a very clear night with unlimited visability. i quickly pulled into the parking lot of little bear lounge, i stopped and got out, i took my cell phone and i took a couple of shots of them. i observed the for about 10 minutes before the smaller of the 3 blinked out and was gone, the second one then started to move to the east before i lost it. the third and final one remained for a while longer before it moved away, as i pulled into my driveway i noticed the 3 rd one moving north over the mount hope bridge, but it was no longer a bright white light, it appeared to have 3 or 4 red lights and the center one was blinking, then i lost sight of it.
trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Portsmouth
There were no other sightings in Portsmouth on or around March 28th 2011
